original_text: When the sin, which they have sinned against it, is known, then the congregation shall offer a young bullock for the sin, and bring him before the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 그 범한 죄를 깨달으면 회중은 수송아지를 속죄제로 드릴지니 그것을 회막 앞으로 끌어다가

sentences.original_text: When the sin, which they have sinned against it, is known,
then the congregation shall offer a young bullock for the sin,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 회중은 그 죄를 위하여 어린 수소를 바치고,

sentences.original_text: and bring him before the tabernacle of the congregation.
